DOC.brief_summary: Abstract : Objectives : [ The goal ] confirm physical activity medium intensity perform gestation influence way delivery , observe adherence exercise among pregnant woman different education level . Methods : Held Center Breastfeeding Incentive city São Sebastião , State São Paulo ( Brazil ) , April 7 , 2008 April 14 , 2009 , prospective study involve 66 primigravid woman , divide two group : exercise group ( GE ) exercise regularly pregnancy , control group ( GC ) exercise regularly period . The significance level adopt study five per cent ( p = 0.05 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Type Birth Physical Exercise During Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: Research conduct Maternal Breastfeeding Incentive Center ( Centro de Incentivo ao Aleitamento Materno - CIAMA ) São Sebastião , São Paulo , Brazil . The 66 primigravida allocate two group : control group , 29 pregnant woman perform kind physical activity pregnancy , another group , exercise group , 37 pregnant woman perform supervised aerobic physical exercise twice week . These volunteer need attend least 20 session include research . No pregnant woman control group exercise group perform regular physical activity year prior pregnancy . All participant receive verbal information research would conduct , agree participate sign free informed consent term . The physical activity prescribe physical therapist remain available address doubt physical activity research . The study follow baseline American Congress Obstetricians Gynecologists ( ACOG ) , environment temperature n't exceed 28 °C . The pregnant woman tell wear comfortable clothes drink water activity , perform physical activity fast . They also instruct interrupt activity case felt dizziness , breathlessness , pain , muscle weakness , dyspnea prior effort case present calf swell pain , bleed sign labor , , still , noticed decrease fetal movement . Two week birth volunteer contact phone collect information type birth .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion : nullipara , sedentary woman , age 18 30 , gestation age superior 18 week without clinical obstetrical complication The volunteer GE could n't gestation age superior 20 week , participate regular physical activity twice week , total frequency least 20 session . The EG pregnant woman frequency inferior 20 session discard study . The volunteer CG could n't perform regular physical activity pregnancy . In group , participant n't perform regular physical activity year prior pregnancy . However , 31 woman discard research : three miscarriage , two GE one GC ; one GE anemia ; one GC preeclampsia ; two loss contact birth , one group ; 11 GE reach minimum frequency ; seven claim personal reason leave research , five GC two GE ; six participant abandon study .
